effect.diamond_pearl: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.platinum: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user’s side of the field have their original Speed doubled. This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.platinum: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.
flavor_text.platinum: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for three turns.
